headline: Indian Valley Chamber of Commerce presents business and community awards
author: Bob Keeler
sentences: FRANCONIA — Lawrence Stevens, who was Hatfield Chamber of Commerce’s treasurer for more than 30 years and executive director for 15 years before the Hatfield Chamber merged in 2021 into Indian Valley Chamber of Commerce, doesn’t have those positions anymore, but he’s still on Hatfield Borough Council, the Hatfield Borough Planning Commission, a life member of the Hatfield Volunteer Fire Company, chairman of the Hatfield Economic Revitalization Co ...
